title.rendered: Granite, Colorado Rafting and Zipline Outpost is Open for the Season!

content.rendered:
Spring is here in Colorado, and it is the perfect time to get out there and explore all the wonderful things Colorado has to offer.  At Arkansas Valley Adventures, we are excited to announce the opening of our Granite outpost and the start of Arkansas River Colorado rafting trips.

Located just minutes from Buena Vista, our Granite outpost offers many options to experience Colorado like never before.  When it comes to rafting, our Granite outpost can connect you with the right trip for your experience level and provide you with the excitement you are looking for.  Tour through the most popular section of rafting in the US, Brown’s Canyon, one of many ways.  Take it easier with our Brown’s Canyon Sizzler trip and experience the awesome beauty, while still getting a good adrenaline rush.  For the experienced rafter looking for the ultimate rush, we offer our Gauntlet (Pine Creek/ Numbers) trip which is the most advanced section of Arkansas River rafting.

Our  Granite outpost offers more than just Arkansas whitewater rafting.  If you want to truly experience how to fly, try ziplining.  Adding ziplining to your rafting trip will make for an adrenaline filled day that you will not soon forget. Come visit AVA at our Granite outpost and let us show you all the exciting things the Arkansas River valley has to offer.  Colorado white water season is here!

Need help planning a trip?  Wondering what to bring rafting?  Trying to figure out the difference between Class III and Class IV rafting? Our friendly sales staff will be happy to help explain the different white water rafting trips we offer and put together the perfect Colorado vacation package for your group.

excerpt.rendered: Spring is here in Colorado, and it is the perfect time to get out there and explore all the wonderful things Colorado has to offer.  […]
